title: Diktaturet
overview: The series is a social experiment whose purpose is to get Norwegian youth to appreciate their voting rights, and use it in this year's municipal elections. We meet eight people with completely different backgrounds. Isolated in an unfamiliar place, they must live in a dictatorship with strict rations and curfews, without access to natural light, and with unpredictable orders from an invisible regime. During the coming days, participants get really feel on your body what it is like to be deprived of rights and benefits which they might otherwise take for granted.
